divs: sighting detailsin the wee hours of early tuesday, september 2, 2013, i was sitting on my north-facing front steps reading email messages (and playing words with friends) on my phone when i observed what i thought was an airplane with landing lights on coming in my direction. what caught my attention was the single bright light was a yellowish orange color and very bright with no distinct features-airplane landing lights are usually more white light - and my home is not on the flight path for the local county airport. the light\object appeared to hover (though could have been moving directly at me) for around 30-40 seconds, then it changed direction moving slowly towards the east. as i watched, it grew less bright and seemed to very slightly lose some altitude. to my surprise a small round glowing piece (of something) dropped off of the light\object. the glowing piece dropped straight down as the bright light\object continued to slowly move eastward. the light\object then drifted behind the top of a tree, but when it reappeared i saw another glowing object dropped straight down from the light\object. neither glowing piece seemed to have any sideways momentum as if they were dropped from a moving vehicle... they just went straight down from the point they were released. they also dropped at a greater speed than the light\object was moving horizontally after the second piece dropped, the light\object changed color from the bright yellowish-orange to more of a bluish white and it dimmed appreciably. i had the impression that it kind of a banded structure coloration with bands of light-bluish and white light. (the light\object also seemed to be fairly spherical.) as the light\object changed color it also began to lose altitude. it then passed out of view behind trees and the hillside. i noted the time to be 1:05am. the time that the light\object took from when it changed direction until it disappeared from view also was maybe 30-40 seconds. through out the observation i heard no noise from the light\object, nor did i see any smoke or emissions. about an hour later i also observed a set of three individual flashes of bright white light that flashed with a pause of about 6-8 seconds between. these small point flashes appeared higher above the horizon in what seemed to be a triangular pattern. i thought they could be a very high altitude airplane, but there was only single point of light in each flash, not a cluster of several lights (and not in a typical flight path that i have seen before.) and to my surprise (again) there was a dim flash of light (like a shooting star) only it went up towards where i had observed the three light flashes. connected?? coincidence??
Summary: Hovering bright orange-yellow object then moved slowly, at least 2 glowing objects dropped from it. color changed to blue-white.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
